wildcards.name: AGI Emergence
wildcards.description: Artificial General Intelligence arrives, reshaping all technology timelines
wildcards.effect: Draw 2 additional TECH cards. All baseline years shift by -2.

wildcards.name: Global Pandemic II
wildcards.description: Another pandemic disrupts supply chains but accelerates certain research
wildcards.effect: Healthcare domain locked. All other domains: flip coin for +1 or -1 year modifier.

wildcards.name: Great Power Conflict
wildcards.description: Major geopolitical conflict reorganizes technology development priorities
wildcards.effect: Security & Defense domain locked. Technology sharing restricted. Flip: +2 years (isolation) or -2 years (mobilization).

wildcards.name: Climate Tipping Point
wildcards.description: Irreversible climate threshold crossed, forcing rapid adaptation
wildcards.effect: Energy & Climate domain locked. All wellbeing cards skew negative until addressed.

wildcards.name: Quantum Supremacy Shock
wildcards.description: A nation achieves unexpected quantum advantage, triggering global response
wildcards.effect: All quantum tech timelines: -2 years. Security implications mandatory.

wildcards.name: Open Source Revolution
wildcards.description: Key quantum breakthroughs released as open source, democratizing access
wildcards.effect: Equity/Fairness outcome automatically positive. All tech cards: -1 year.
